edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui
Class TagsListPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.TagsListPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class TagsListPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Automatically recognizes tags that are entered in and converts the string to an atomic entity. If it cannot find a match, it will create a new tag. Also displays all tags currently associated with this file.

See Also:
Serialized Form
